recommendations: Carolyn Burica is an excellent teacher.  She clearly expresses her ideas and thoughts.  She is also very creative in her teaching style which keeps her students listening and learning.

September 22, 2014, Jeffrey D. was a client of Carolyn’s

Carolyn provided some great insight into the struggles that my daughter faced during a transition to a new school in addition to learning how to cope with living with ADHD.  We had recently discovered that a number of hindrances our daughter faced in learning while at school was due to ADHD, and Carolyn's understanding of how to teach children facing that battle helped us and our daughter to develop successful learning methods.  I cannot speak higher of her care for students as well as her integrity as a top-notch educator.

summary: Dynamic and proven writer with multiple years of experience in all facets of the writing process. Accomplished editor, proofreader, curriculum developer, and assessment creator. Specialized in all areas of instructional content, creative voice and tone. Licensed and professional educator. Writing specialist and tutor for a diverse population and age group of students. Expert in Common Core Standards, differentiated instruction and student engagement. Detail-oriented and excellent communicator.
